name: Bounce A Ball
description:
Bounce A Ball is a game where you play as a rubber ball  with the goal to get to the end of every level. The game also has hidden secret levels that you can find in the game. Almost every level has points in them and collecting all the points can give you a high rank when you finish the stage.

Bounce A Ball Features:

- Ten main game levels

- Five secret levels (The codes for the levels are found in the main game levels)

- Different customization options for the player

- Hardmode (Does not affect secret levels)

This game was first created as a school project and it's original plan was to have it a endless platform, those plans changed when I discovered the physic material. I reworked my plans and had the game be a ten level game that uses this bouncing skill.

Update 1.6 (Water on Mars update): Water physics for the player has been changed. Secret Level 5 (Lost on Mars) had some slight performance improvements. Changes done to the spring pad to make the launching cleaner.
